trans-unit.source: References the method to call when retrieving row data from a provider.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento al metodo da chiamare quando il recupero dei dati delle righe da un provider.

trans-unit.source: The ParametersCallback delegate represents the method to call for retrieving row data from a provider based on a parameter from the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato ParametersCallback rappresenta il metodo da chiamare per il recupero dei dati delle righe da un provider in base a un parametro dal consumer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method contains a ParametersCallback delegate parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo contiene un parametro del delegato ParametersCallback.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A> method is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class to retrieve row data for transformation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A>metodo viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>classe per recuperare i dati delle righe per la trasformazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A>
